item.name: Get All Projects Flow
item.description:
01_Login - Getting Tenant1 credentials  
02_GetAllProjects - Get project list for tenant 1  
03_GetProjectById - Get specific Tenant 1 project  
04_Login - Getting Tenant2 credentials  
05_GetProjectById - Trying to get Tenant1 project with Tenant2 token - SHOULD FAIL 404  
06_GetAllProjects - get project list for Tenant 2 (different from list in 02_GetAllProjects)  
07_GetProjectById - Get specific Tenant2 project, should succeed
